mapper.insert: insert into daily_reports (id, report, working_date, mismatch_money, admin_id, employee_id, pos_id) values (#{id}, #{report}, #{workingDate}, #{mismatchMoney}, 0, #{employeeId}, #{posId})
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(D.mismatch_money), 0) as total from employees E, daily_reports D where E.id = D.employee_id
